name: Tracks
description: Learn through a comprehensive series of topics, lessons, and projects. It is well-designed even for newcomers.

name: Projects
description: Build and showcase projects to display your actual skill. Share them as portfolio to attract employers or clients.

name: Mentorship
description: Get dedicated 1-on-1 private mentor from the experienced professionals. Learning process can be customized to fit your needs.

name: Forum
description: Discuss a wide range of interesting topics. It is a safe and clean place for everyone to ask questions and answer them.

name: Collaboration
description: Collaborate with other community members. Build and showcase your projects together or with mentors.

name: Opportunities
description: Discover opportunities of full-time job or freelance work. Find the meaningful job you love doing.
